com.github.rmielnik.list

Class AbstractUpdatableViewHolder<T extends RecyclerItem>

  • AbstractViewHolder
    • com.github.rmielnik.list.AbstractUpdatableViewHolder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -

    is a class that implements interface RecyclerItem or an interface that extends interface RecyclerItem. Instances of T can be passed to bind in order to be represented on a View.


    public class AbstractUpdatableViewHolder<T extends RecyclerItem>
extends AbstractViewHolder

    An extension of class AbstractViewHolder that is able to handle update payload.

    In addition to AbstractViewHolder.bind this class exposes an additional version of bind method that can handle an update payload generated by androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil.ItemCallback.getChangePayload.

    See Also:
    class AbstractViewHolder, AbstractViewHolder.bind, bind

      Constructors

      An extension of class AbstractViewHolder that is able to handle update payload.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractUpdatableViewHolder

        public AbstractUpdatableViewHolder(@NotNull
                                   android.view.View view)

        An extension of class AbstractViewHolder that is able to handle update payload.

        In addition to AbstractViewHolder.bind this class exposes an additional version of bind method that can handle an update payload generated by androidx.recyclerview.widget.DiffUtil.ItemCallback.getChangePayload.

        See Also:
        class AbstractViewHolder, AbstractViewHolder.bind, bind

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public void bind(@NotNull
                 T item,
                 @Nullable
                 java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Object> updatePayload)

        Binds item's data and updatePayload with a view that is attached to this ViewHolder.

        Parameters:
        item - a RecyclerItem with data to be represented on this ViewHolder's view
        updatePayload - a list of data representing updates to be applied on ViewHolder's view.
        See Also:
        item, updatePayload
